works.description:
On http://www.transcomworld.com/e-mail_support_services.html  the last paragraph is copied from my website. 

This person has even copied my biodata.. 

"Proprietor of 3itechnology has worked for Amazon.com’s customer support while working in an Indian Call center (Daksh) before starting his own BPO company."

This sentence is applicable only to me.

(My current page is bit different as I have made some changes to this article on my website today)
